snippet: For the first time since 2010, New York audiences had the chance to take in work by Christian Rizzo, at the French Institute Alliance Française and at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews concert of Christian Rizzo dance works, performed by Lyon Opera Ballet, at Brooklyn Academy of Music as part of Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 2010, New York audiences had the chance to take in work by Christian Rizzo, at the French Institute Alliance Française and at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
